dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3056 IH: Camp Nelson National Monument Boundary Expansion Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Barr introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To redesignate Camp Nelson National Monument, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Camp Nelson National Monument Boundary Expansion Act.

The Secretary of the Interior may acquire the approximately 132 acres of land and interests in land generally depicted as Proposed Monument Boundary Expansion on the map titled Camp Nelson National Monument Proposed Boundary Expansion Nicholasville, Kentucky, numbered 532/174,965 and dated April 29, 2025, for inclusion in the Camp Nelson National Monument.

subsection.text: Section 2303 of the John D. Dingell, Jr. Conservation, Management, and Recreation Act (Public Law 116–9) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the heading, by striking Heritage;
in subsection (a)(2), by striking Camp Nelson Heritage National Monument and inserting Camp Nelson National Monument; and
in subsection (b)(1), by striking Camp Nelson Heritage National Monument and inserting Camp Nelson National Monument.

subsection.text: Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to Camp Nelson Heritage National Monument shall be deemed to be a reference to Camp Nelson National Monument.
